title: Finance Minister Sees Indonesia’s Economy Expanding Beyond 6% in 2026
body: Minister Purbaya says stronger public-private coordination and investment reforms could lift growth to 6% this year.

title: Rupiah Gains as Trade Optimism Offsets Global Tensions
body: Indonesia’s rupiah posted a modest gain as markets reacted to positive trade news amid ongoing global uncertainty.

title: IDX Confirms Jeffrey Hendrik as Interim President Director
body: Jeffrey Hendrik steps in as acting IDX chief after Iman Rachman resigned amid market turmoil and a temporary trading halt.

title: Sarawak Open to Doing Business with Indonesia’s New Capital
body: Sarawak Premier Abang Johari says that there is an opportunity for businesspeople from both sides to team up in Nusantara.

title: JCI Reclaims Positive Territory After MSCI Talks Soothe Market Nerves
body: JCI rebounded sharply on Tuesday, jumping 2.52% after MSCI talks eased market jitters.

title: Merdeka Copper Gold Targets Up to 205,000 Ounces in 2026 Growth Push
body: Merdeka Copper Gold targets up to 205,000 ounces of gold in 2026, driven by first output from Pani and steady production at Tujuh Bukit.

title: ‘Lawmakers’ Review First’: Indonesia on What Comes Next After US Deal Signing
body: Other trade pacts usually have to go through Indonesian lawmakers before the terms can fully enter into force.

title: Indonesia Targets Strong Start to 2026 With $760 Million Stimulus Package
body: Rp 12.8 trillion stimulus package featuring transport discounts and social aid is set to bolster Indonesia’s economy in early 2026.

title: Indonesian Coal Export Sink 19.70% with India, China as Top Buyers
body: India imported $4.98 billion worth of Indonesian coal throughout 2025, BPS says.

title: Indonesia’s Exports Hold Strong, but Geopolitical Tensions Threaten 2026 Growth
body: Indonesia’s trade surplus extended in December as economists flagged growing protectionist risks and cost pressures facing exports.
